channel.title: Happy Holidays From Cherry Lane
channel.desc: In three intertwined timelines, different generations of one family navigate holiday challenges, from caring for an aging father to planning a Christmas Eve wedding.

channel.title: The Great Christmas Switch
channel.desc: A single city girl decides to switch places for Christmas in an effort to get away from their problems for a little while. Romantic comedy.

channel.title: Twas The Night Before Christmas
channel.desc: Eager to break into directing, former actress Madison takes charge of a town's annual Christmas Eve play.

channel.title: A Holiday Spectacular
channel.desc: This Christmas, journey back to the 1950s, where heiress Maggie is making her dream of dancing on stage in the Christmas Spectacular come true.
